snippet: General Motors Co will recall 27,051 Spark mini cars in South Korea due to a defective transmission mount, the latest in a string of global recalls by the U.S. automaker....

headline.print_headline: GM to Recall 27,051 Spark Cars in Korea Due to Transmission Defect
headline.main: GM to Recall 27,051 Spark Cars in Korea Due to Transmission Defect

lead_paragraph: General Motors Co will recall 27,051 Spark mini cars in South Korea due to a defective transmission mount, the latest in a string of global recalls by the U.S. automaker.
